title: Limited Time Emotes Should Be Owned If You Have The Icon

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
I Spent 20 Euro on the **Sad Re-Gifted Amumu Icon** for the emote and i was hoping that i could maybe use it forever now that we got the new emote sytem but maybe i should just cry like the emote ;-;
i mean why let people who spent alot of money on an emote be able to use it forever

replies.body: Upvote! I love the Star Guardian emote and I'm really sad it's gone...

Any chance of making them availible for those that avoided them because they explicitly said they where limited to the event.

I already own the original arcade baron icon and since the arcade event icon was a copy of it I didn't get it.

If I'd known that the emote would be permanent that would have changed my purchase during the event since arcade is my favorite line (but sinse I can't equip 2 of the same icon it didn't make any sense to purchase the icon for owners of the original icon).
I want my riven emote back. :(

"We are working on getting certain event emotes into the new system and if you earned them during those events they will automatically be put in your inventory.

This isn't as straightforward as we expected but it is currently in the works"

-Thetimteemo (rioter)

source: https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/75r0z4/im_a_little_annoyed_that_old_emotes_that_i/do8av0p/


I generally feel that this is a good thing (I also like the sad amumu) but feel a bit cheated that they can't be more upfront about this. I deliberatly didn't get the arcade icon because it was a remake/copy of an icon I've owned since release and the emote explicitly said it wasn't permanent. Now I'd understand if this was an event from years ago, but this was an event about a month or 2 before the emote release, 

If this would have been presented correcly it would deffinetly have changed my purchase priority, since arcade is my favorite skin line.

(I also kind of feel that the owners of the original icon could have gotten the emote aswell, we did pay rp for the original icon)
This would be cool if they did. A lot of people bought icons at the time for these and it would be cool to get some back. I had the arcade emote and I loved it.
Yeah, I miss my fat poro emote. :(
I would really like to not have to buy a new tsm icon every year
While theyre at it can URF icons work globally. I like smiting my foes
